scripts.env_QA3: cross-env TEST_ENV=qa3 npx playwright test tests/tc-studio
scripts.env_QA4: cross-env TEST_ENV=qa4 npx playwright test tests/tc-studio
scripts.env_STAGING: cross-env TEST_ENV=staging npx playwright test tests/tc-studio
scripts.env_QA3_ui: cross-env TEST_ENV=qa3 npx playwright test tests/tc-studio --ui
scripts.env_QA4_ui: cross-env TEST_ENV=qa4 npx playwright test tests/tc-studio --ui
scripts.env_STAGING_ui: cross-env TEST_ENV=staging npx playwright test tests/tc-studio --ui
scripts.env_QA3_spec: cross-env TEST_ENV=qa3 npx playwright test tc-studio/sign_in_POM.spec.js
scripts.env_QA4_spec: cross-env TEST_ENV=qa4 npx playwright test tc-studio/verify_album_level_POM.spec.js
scripts.env_STAGING_spec: cross-env TEST_ENV=staging npx playwright test tc-studio/verify_album_level_POM.spec.js
